titleInfo.title: Hughes, W. Hastings in Rugby, Tennessee to Temple, O.P. in Knoxville, Tennessee

subject.topic: Utopian Impulses of the 19th century such as Nashoba, Ruskin, and Rugby .

subject.geographic: The Development of the Industrial United States (1870-1900).

mods.note: Instructions to take legal steps "for registration etc." of the "Rugby Commissary" to run the "store business." Lists names of trustees and back contains Temple`s notes on his response to the request.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
